rows.label: qev055602_MSG0001
rows.name: Closer now... Come on... Let me observe you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0002
rows.name: There is no cause to be afraid. Come closer...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_JNK0010
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev055602_SEL0011
rows.name:
Warn Nen'celeg that she's the
one who should be afraid.

rows.label: qev055602_JNK0020
rows.name: Order

rows.label: qev055602_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Nen'celeg to run away immediately.

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0003
rows.name: You humans are so strange.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0004
rows.name:
The need for a more thorough study of Mira's ecology
is plain to see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0005
rows.name:
And the most expedient method of expanding that
knowledge is to go into the field and interact with
various organisms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0006
rows.name:
You humans are so limited in your behavioral patterns.
Is fight or flight really all that you are capable of?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0007
rows.name:
The need for a more thorough study of Mira's ecology
is plain to see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0008
rows.name:
And the most expedient method of expanding that
knowledge is to go into the field and interact with
various organisms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0009
rows.name:
Please do not concern yourself with me any further.
You are interrupting my research.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0010
rows.name: Feel free to return to the city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0011
rows.name:
What a fascinating organism! I would dearly like to
procure a blood sample.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0025
rows.name:
But how to extract it? I should have brought a knife of
some sort...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0026
rows.name: This is...danger? I am in danger of dying?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0027
rows.name: Well then, what action can I take to avoid death?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0028
rows.name:
You...you are that human. Can you do something to
resolve this situation?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0012
rows.name:
I do not know whether to thank you for saving my life
or criticize your violent actions. Which is appropriate?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest Thanks

rows.label: qev055602_SEL0031
rows.name: Answer that you would appreciate some gratitude.

rows.label: qev055602_JNK0040
rows.name: Suggest Criticism

rows.label: qev055602_SEL0041
rows.name:
Say that if Nen'celeg feels like criticizing you,
she is free to do so.

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0013
rows.name:
I cannot approve of a mode of behavior that resorts to
violence before attempting communication.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0014
rows.name:
But had you not assisted me, the likelihood of death for
this body I inhabit was 87 percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0015
rows.name:
I believe you are correct in suggesting that thanks are
in order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0016
rows.name: Then you acknowledge your failings?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0017
rows.name:
I had thought humans incapable of that sort of self-
criticism, and yet apparently some among you do
possess reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0018
rows.name:
Still, had you not assisted me, the likelihood of death
for this body I inhabit was 87 percent, so I suppose
some thanks are in order.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_JNK0050
rows.name: Persuade

rows.label: qev055602_SEL0051
rows.name:
Urge Nen'celeg to go home because
Nan'celeg is worried.

rows.label: qev055602_JNK0060
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev055602_SEL0061
rows.name:
Suggest that Nen'celeg try more
Orphe-appropriate work in the city.

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0019
rows.name: Nan'celeg is a strange one as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0020
rows.name:
Even if my body were destroyed, so long as the Ovah
persists, it is not a true death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0021
rows.name: Surely Nan'celeg knows this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0022
rows.name:
But very well. I will return to New LA as you suggest.
Mostly out of curiosity as to how Nan'celeg responds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0023
rows.name:
I will concede that remaining here presents a high risk
of damage to my body.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0024
rows.name:
I will head back for now, and consider how best to
study the primordial creatures in the future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0029
rows.name:
I am back home safe, yet Nan'celeg's behavior is
strange.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055602_MSG0030
rows.name:
Heh. It is rather amusing, actually, and worth seeing
for yourself. Speak with him, if you like.[ST:wait ]
